reference_summary:
BUTEFO 4 Pack Shower and Bath Set with Natural Boar Bristles Bath Brush, Pumice Stone Brush for Foot Callus, Dry Brush SPA Massage for Cellulite and Lymphatic, Natural Loofah Sponge for Women Kids
BUTEFO
{'Material': 'Sponge', 'Brand': 'BUTEFO', 'Power Source': 'Hand_powered', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Massage,Massaging,Tightening,Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '14.29 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 13.44 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'BUTEFO'}
I was really excited to have this back brush. But when I went to put it together it didn’t go... no matter how hard I tried! That was upsetting. I had to get my dremel out to sand it down so it fit better and it’s still not all the way on. With that said, the brush is super nice and scratchy on the back. And the foot brush/pumice stone is really nice too! I hope your brush combo has less flaws.
Didn’t fit
Training Head Hairdressing Head Rainbow Synthetic Fiber Hair 24inch Mannequin Cosmetology Manikin Dolls Head for Hairdresser Styling Practicing with Free Clamp + DIY Hair Styling Braid Set
SENSAIRUITE
{'Brand': 'SENSAIRUITE', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 6.93 x 6.5 inches; 1.83 Pounds'}
[[VIDEOID:3e9a0a4c1e05b8d79256b9b63cdd466f]] One of the main reasons I got this head was to use hot tools on it to practice before I used them on me. IT DOES NOT CURL!!!! It says that it does, but it doesn’t. I have tried 3-4 different hot tools and it won’t hold a curl at all. The hair is soft, it’s very thick. So if you wanted it just to do some braiding, it would work well for that. Not happy.
DOES NOT CURL!!!!

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Interaction**: Continues to engage with personal care products, particularly in bath and shower accessories, hairdressing tools, and manicure sets. The recent interaction highlights a notable dissatisfaction with performance, specifically regarding suction capability in tools intended for efficiency.
- **Quality Expectations**: Maintains high standards for product functionality and usability, increasingly critical of items that fail to meet expectations. The latest review reflects frustration with products that do not deliver reliable performance, emphasizing the need for tools that excel in usability.
- **Material Preference**: Remains interested in both natural and synthetic materials, with a strong focus on eco-friendly and sustainable options.
- **Product Benefits**: Seeks multifunctional tools that enhance grooming skills and personal styling, though recent experiences suggest a need for effective performance over aesthetic appeal.
- **User Experience**: Values practical, easy-to-handle products but has recently encountered issues with products lacking in expected effectiveness. This highlights a continued focus on travel-friendly items and efficient designs.
- **Target Audience**: Retains a family-oriented mindset, with interest in tools suitable for children while prioritizing specialized personal grooming items.
- **Overall Sentiment**: Exhibits a shift towards skepticism regarding product quality, favoring items that promise efficiency and effective usability, coupled with appealing design elements, particularly in personal care routines.
